title: JacksClub
author: JacksClub
created_time: November 24, 2023, 05:01:34 AMLast edit: November 26, 2023, 05:58:21 AM by JacksClub
content: Hey Bitcointalk Community,We invite you to be a part of the Jack's Club experience! Join our exclusive review campaign and share your thoughts on our platform. Your feedback matters, and we're excited to reward you for it.Why Jack's Club?Cutting-edge crypto casino with a focus on user experience.Unparalleled rakeback & rewards with our exceptional first deposit bonus â€“ a staggering 270% match up to $20,000!Secure and private gaming environment.RULES & QUALIFICATIONS:Must be at least a Jr. Member or higher on Bitcointalk.Enroll only one Bitcointalk account in this Review campaign.Negative trust-rated accounts won't be accepted.Craft an honest and constructive review about Jack's Club.Post your review in text format on this thread.The review should have a minimum of 50 words.Write your review in English.Include both positive and negative points about Jack's Club.Avoid plagiarism or using AI tools to write your review.Low-quality reviews won't be accepted.Accepted participants can post their reviews and receive payment.Post your review within 7 days after acceptance; reviews posted beyond the limit won't be accepted.Each participant can post only one review.The campaign manager and Jack's Club team have the right to modify content/rules/rewards/duration at any time.REWARDS:$10 in BTC per qualified review.HOW TO JOIN:Sign-up on JacksClub.io and apply through this thread using this format:Bitcointalk Username: XYZJack's Club Username: XYZBTC Wallet Address: XYZLet the reviews begin! Accepted participants will be listed on the spreadsheet. Thank you for being a part of the Jack's Club journey!Spreadsheet

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: This topic should be on the Bounties (Altcoin) child board as the reward is being paid in USDT (erc-20). Only if the reward is in Bitcoin then you can create a topic on this board. It would be nice if @OP could move this topic to the right board for the forum members to participate in the review campaign.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.created_time: November 24, 2023, 06:59:05 AMLast edit: November 28, 2023, 09:17:19 PM by bitbollo
comments.body: Bitcointalk Username: bitbolloJack's Club Username: Morgana1970BTC Wallet Address: bc1qm9wnwsgy52jdefvm5g4w72lxqep5d9ks4gq62pedited _ review 28 Nov 2023- I would "collapse" chat from the scratch. After home page is loading I think it's something useless sees a lot of messages on the right. (and potentially people could use this space for pulling scams if not moderated constantly but in some sites I have seen people scammed by other players like with loan requests).- The graphic (icons of the games in home page) it's pretty the same of another famous casino/gambling site ... I know that many of users are pretty aware. But I don't know if this is a choice made voluntary or there is a kind of affiliation with that "famous casino/gambling site".- Related this last point, I tried a couple of games and everything was fine... graphic and other related stuffs are completely differents - Free coins, even if worthless, are a nice idea to made players more familiar with games... this idea deserve probably more attention by admins since can lead to a lot of promo and so on...- it would be nice see here on forum some signature campaign or other promos since a lot of gamblers are around here and can easily join the website.- interesting option bonus for deposits and so on but personally I prefer rakeback/cashback and other promotions...- sports bet are missing  in a certain way must be added  since people want betting not only in casino
